title: ICE:  compiler/rustc_privacy/src/lib.rs:282:17: unexpected type: FreshTy(0)

labels.name: T-rustdoc
labels.description: Relevant to the rustdoc team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
`./src/test/ui/traits/alias/self-in-generics.rs` ### Code ```Rust #![feature(trait_alias)] pub trait SelfInput = Fn(&mut Self); pub fn f(_f: &dyn SelfInput) {} //~^ ERROR the trait alias `SelfInput` cannot be made into an object [E0038] fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustdoc 1.65.0-nightly (e8dc8bca2 2022-08-13) binary: rustdoc commit-hash: e8dc8bca2118ec1ed5970790614f0b81e9167f10 commit-date: 2022-08-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.65.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` ```
Backtrace
